lead_paragraph: In a speech before a regional summit meeting, the foreign minister of the Philippines said its "northern neighbor" was making progress on an airstrip.

headline.main: Manila Appeals to Asean to Stop China Reclamation in South China Sea
headline.print_headline: Manila Appeals to Asean to Stop China Reclamation in South China Sea

snippet: In a speech before a regional summit meeting, the foreign minister of the Philippines said its "northern neighbor" was making progress on an airstrip.
